Build my computer (Fedora - 24)

Complete this after your PC is re-installed / rebuilt / recovered.

  1. Configure sudo. Switch to root
    echo '%x1kxk630     ALL=(ALL)     NOPASSWD: ALL' >> /etc/sudoers
  2. Configure proxy for yum
    sudo vi /etc/dnf/dnf.conf

    Add these with the correct password 

    proxy=http://170.64.0.72:8080
proxy_username=x1kxk630
proxy_password=<passw0rd>
  3. Install updates
    sudo dnf update
  4. Reboot
    sudo init 6
  5. Install some basic softwares
    sudo dnf -y install wget shutter putty geany
  6. Install Libre Office
    sudo dnf groupinstall "Office/Productivity"
  7. Install correct resolv.conf
    sudo scp taitc118:/etc/resolv.conf /etc/resolv.conf
  8. Install Display drivers
  9. Install Virtual Box
    1. Re-create itc3636vm
  10. Install Chrome
  11. Enable SSH connections through firewall.
